history.proof: intros. hauto brefl: on use: @iter_nat_Chasles unfold: plus, sum_n_m, zero, AbelianGroup.sort, AbelianGroup.plus, AbelianGroup.zero inv: AbelianGroup.mixin_of.

exceptions.exn: In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m, k : nat H0 : (m <= k)%nat Unable to unify "plus ?M2425 zero = ?M2425" with "iter plus zero (seq.iota n match n with | 0 => S k | S l => k - l end) a = plus (iter plus zero (seq.iota n (n - n)) a) (iter plus zero (seq.iota n match n with | 0 => S k | S l => k - l end) a)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of plus_assoc (plus _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (plus_comm (a m)) (plus (a m) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G m, k : nat H0 : (m <= k)%nat IHle : plus (a 0%nat) (iter plus zero (seq.iota 1 k) a) = plus zero (plus (a 0%nat) (iter plus zero (seq.iota 1 k) a)) H2 : forall x y z : G, plus x (plus y z) = plus (plus x y) z H1 : forall x : G, plus x zero = x H4 : forall x y z : G, plus x (plus y z) = plus (plus x y) z H3 : forall x : G, plus x zero = x H : forall x y : G, plus x y = plus y x Unable to unify "plus (a 0%nat) (plus zero (iter plus zero (seq.iota 1 (k - 0)) a))" with "plus zero (plus (a 0%nat) (iter plus zero (seq.iota 1 k) a))".

original: intros. unfold sum_n_m. unfold iter_nat. induction H. - intros. simpl. apply plus_zero_r. - intros. simpl. rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite (plus_comm (a m)). rewrite <- plus_assoc. rewrite IHle. reflexivity.
